author: __flcl
content: Yeah me too, it's because transactions come in mempool form, but execution payload form is expected. Not sure how these transactions appear on CL side, is it only via getPayload?

author: __flcl
content: Have no idea how to fix, nethermind shows that it returns execution payload form everywhere except in transaction gossip.
